system.description:
Each time you acquire this Skill, learn one Elementalist spell (see next three pages).
Offensive (@ICON[offensive]) Tectonomancer spells use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check.

The strength of the earth itself surges through your ally. Until this spell ends, the target treats their Might and Willpower attributes as one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12) and is immune to weak and shaken as long as they are standing on solid ground. They lose the benefit in mid-air, on a platform, or on the deck of a ship, but regain it if they reach the ground again during this scene.

Note: in practical terms, this means there are encounters you just won’t be able to use it in.

@LOSS[20 mp]

Better rock tossing through magic! You create three Perfect Stones as the following one-handed thrown weapon - It is limited (3)

Perfect Stones

【MIG + DEX】 or 【INS + WLP】

【HR + 10】Earth

Opportunity: Each target hit suffers @EFFECT[dazed].

If you have a free hand slot as you cast this spell, you may equip the Perfect Stones to it and make a free attack with one as part of the same action. When you’ve attacked with your third Perfect Stone, the effects of the spell end.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.Wo9LDqTbd4jGLsi6]{Perfect Stones} @LOSS[10 mp]

summary.value: One creature suffers 10 damage of a type of your choice (10 Air, 10 Bolt, 10 Earth, 10 Fire, or 10 Ice).

system.description: For @LOSS[2 ip], one creature suffers 10 damage of a type of your choice ( @DMG[10 air], @DMG[10 bolt], @DMG[10 earth], @DMG[10 fire], or @DMG[10 ice] ).

summary.value: This allows the entire group to rest in the wilderness and at sea.

system.description: For @LOSS[4 ip], this allows the entire group to rest in the wilderness and at sea.

summary.value: One creature recovers from a single status effect.

system.description: For @LOSS[2 ip] one creature recovers from a single status effect.

ALSO: Earth Mage, Stoneshaper, Terramancer

A Tectonomancer wields magic that manipulates the living earth. Whether they got their start with rocks and dirt or they’re an Elementalist who later specialized, nobody can doubt their expertise now.

Tectonomancy encourages a deliberate, almost ponderous approach to problem-solving, but not all practitioners are willing to take it slow. Those who last the longest recognize that it is best not to be reckless when calling upon such a dreadfully powerful and destructive art. After all, even the mightiest castle needs a foundation to stand on.

TECTONOMANCER FREE BENEFITS

  • Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points by 5.

  • You may perform Rituals whose effects fall within the Elementalism discipline. As long as they work with Earth, Metal or Living Wood.

  • Masterying Tectonomancer qualifies you to take the Powerful Spell Heroic Skills.

TECTONOMANCER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.zh4aSUXfN0gddzJj]{Earthmeld (SL2)}

At 【SL 1】 you have the ability to move through solid stone and dirt without disturbing it. If solid ground is available, you may use an action and spend 1 Fabula Point to sink into it to take cover for the rest of a scene. You will have to emerge from the earth nearby.

At 【SL 2】 you can take willing creatures with you a short distance - through a wall or rockfall, for instance. (If you release a creature, the magic launches them to the surface in an unpredictable direction; you can’t trap them, though you could try this as an unconventional travel method.)

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.xp1Csz7LczIW8Zoc]{Tectonomancy (SL10)}

Each time you acquire this Skill, learn one Elementalist spell (see next three pages).
Offensive (@ICON[offensive]) Tectonomancer spells use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.iWV0UGI9HiDPfmVa]{Mineral Spirit}

When you use the Inventory action to create a Tonic, the creature that drinks it recovers from all status effects, instead of just one.

Note: for the love of Bahamut, do not actually drink mineral spirits!

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.DHavgDFfytd17Ze3]{Solid Path (SL3)}

You are immune to environmental effects that would affect you via dangerous ground (for example, marshy ground inflicting slow or unstable footing filling a clock towards an avalanche.)

The GM is the final arbiter on what counts. You may extend this benefit to other creatures for the rest of a scene by spending 【20 - (5 × SL)】MP for each creature.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.mbuSMM9ZMFdoddEK]{Stonework}

You always have the tools you need to work stone or metal - even types you’ve never seen before - without spending Inventory Points. Additionally, whenever you fill in or erase a segment of a clock related to building, reinforcing, or destroying a structure made of stone, metal, or living wood, you may fill in or erase an additional segment.

TECHTONOMANCER SPELLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.aDULLlZqy8QhHpHp]{[Tectonomancer Spells]} | @UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-handouts.JournalEntry.k7ZTC2cfSI9wgASF]{Tectonomancer Rules}

HEROIC SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.mMxNkLHUnIjwXVT5]{Cat 10}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.VPqEtc9VTVeQXy10]{Geoswimmer}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.oWAM9jhnAIXbbHRT]{Legendary Metal}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.DBUmTrx8USXsGz9q]{Lithommancy}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.Uhr8LxGtI95fynsG]{Seismic Sense}

CREDIT

Class Design, Writing and Development Dr. Razno

Heroic Skills Help Cinder

Layout by Ophan, based on the official Fabula Ultima layout by Emanuele Galletto

ALSO: Paladin, Soldier, Yōjinbō

Proud and selfless, Guardians are individuals who know the value of life… and are willing to sacrifice themselves for a person, nation or ideal they have sworn to protect. They are often extraordinary and impressive individuals, such as valiant soldiers or veterans scarred by a thousand battles. While some Guardians may appear loud and boisterous, many are simply masking the tormented memory of those they failed to protect.

GUARDIAN FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points by 5.
  • Gain the ability to equip martial armor and martial shields.

GUARDIAN SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.ZvZT5jWlBZVm1Gmd]{Bodyguard}

If you perform the Guard action and choose to provide cover to another creature, that creature gains Resistance to all damage types until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.7wF1oulk0Zn7ITTF]{Defensive Mastery} (SL5)

As long as you have a shield or a martial armor equipped, all damage you suffer is reduced by 【SL】 (applied before damage Affinities).

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.aPQXTQegswRisA1R]{Dual Shieldbearer}

You may now equip a shield in your main hand slot. As long as you have two shields equipped, you gain the benefits of both items and may treat them as the following combined two-handed melee brawling weapon:

WEAPONACCURACYDAMAGEQUALITY
Twin Shields【MIG + MIG】【HR + 5】physical Deals extra damage equal to your 【SL】 in defensive mastery (above).

Deals extra damage equal to your 【SL】 in defensive mastery (above).

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.X4KdFiQmzikrsM6v]{Fortress} (SL5)

Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points by 【SL × 3】.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.Z4WIA15aR4uLL5ES]{Protect}

When another creature is threatened by an attack, spell or other danger, you may take their place (any Checks that are part of the danger will be performed against you; you may declare the use of this Skill before or after the Checks have been made). If the danger already affected you, it affects you twice (resolve both instances separately); you also cannot protect multiple creatures from the same danger. If you use this Skill during a conflict, you cannot use it again until the start of your next turn.

ALSO: Fighter, Rōnin, Warrior

Weaponmasters spend years upon years honing their close combat arts. Most of them display remarkable skill with a variety of weapons; others have trained to become one with a specific armament. Many Weaponmasters follow and protect someone out of love or loyalty, but there are also those who tirelessly wander the world seeking worthy opponents, legendary magical weapons, or capable teachers.

WEAPONMASTER FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points by 5.
  • Gain the ability to equip martial melee weapons and martial shields.

WEAPONMASTER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.IhBCZsilt0bj5RJK]{Bladestorm}

When you perform a melee attack, you may spend 10 Mind Points to choose one option: the attack gains multi (2); or you increase the attack’s multi property by one, up to a maximum of multi (3).

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.7jWycVYFgZ1BMxch]{Bone Crusher} (SL4)

When you hit one or more targets with a melee attack that would deal damage, you may have the attack deal no damage. If you do, choose one option: inflict dazed on each target hit by the attack; or inflict weak on each target hit by the attack; or each target hit by the attack loses 【SL × 10】 Mind Points. Describe your maneuver!

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.WZDdQfw9VF64La2P]{Breach} (SL3)

You may use an action and spend 5 Mind Points to perform a free attack with a melee weapon you have equipped. This attack must target a single creature. If the attack is successful, it deals no damage and you choose one option: you destroy one shield equipped by the target; or you destroy the target’s equipped armor; or whenever the target suffers damage from a source before the start of your next turn, that source deals 【SL × 2】 extra damage to them.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.XhcTVGtGEk7L2Ddq]{Counterattack}

After an enemy hits or misses you with a melee attack, if the Result of their Accuracy Check was an even number, you may perform a free attack against that enemy (after their attack has been fully resolved). This attack must be a melee attack and must have that enemy as its only target; treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.ztxLYzo1ADCaRupR]{Melee Weapon Mastery} (SL4)

You gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to all Accuracy Checks with melee weapons.
When you perform a melee attack, you may spend @LOSS[10 mp] to choose one option: the attack gains multi (2); or you increase the attack's multi property by one, up to a maximum of multi (3).
Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points by 【SL × 3】.
